kv2.10:5.3: Lokuttare sote paṭihaññati no lokiye, lokuttarena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti no lokiyena, sāvakā paṭivijānanti no puthujjanāti?
kv2.10:6.1: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatīti?
kv2.10:6.3: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:7.1: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānantīti?
kv2.10:7.3: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:8.1: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ puthujjanā paṭivijānantīti?
kv2.10:8.3: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ puthujjanā paṭivijānanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:9.3: Maggo phalaṃ nibbānaṃ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṃ, sakadāgāmimaggo sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, anāgāmimaggo anāgāmiphalaṃ, arahattamaggo arahattaphalaṃ, satipaṭṭhānaṃ sammappadhānaṃ iddhipādo indriyaṃ balaṃ bojjhaṅgoti?
kv2.10:10.3: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ suṇantīti?
kv2.10:10.5: Lokuttaro dhammo sotaviññeyyo, sotasmiṃ paṭihaññati, sotassa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti?
kv2.10:11.1: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na sotaviññeyyo, na sotasmiṃ paṭihaññati, na sotassa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti?
kv2.10:11.3: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na sotaviññeyyo, na sotasmiṃ paṭihaññati, na sotassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:12.3: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre rajjeyyunti?
kv2.10:12.5: Lokuttaro dhammo rāgaṭṭhāniyo rajanīyo kamanīyo madanīyo bandhanīyo mucchanīyoti?
kv2.10:13.1: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na rāgaṭṭhāniyo na rajanīyo na kamanīyo na madanīyo na bandhanīyo na mucchanīyoti?
kv2.10:13.3: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na rāgaṭṭhāniyo na rajanīyo na kamanīyo na madanīyo na bandhanīyo na mucchanīyo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:14.3: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre dusseyyunti?
kv2.10:15.1: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na dosaṭṭhāniyo na kopaṭṭhāniyo na paṭighaṭṭhāniyoti?
kv2.10:15.3: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na dosaṭṭhāniyo na kopaṭṭhāniyo na paṭighaṭṭhāniyo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:16.3: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre muyheyyunti?
kv2.10:16.5: Lokuttaro dhammo mohaṭṭhāniyo aññāṇakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṃvattanikoti?
kv2.10:17.1: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na mohaṭṭhāniyo na aññāṇakaraṇo na acakkhukaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṃvattanikoti?
kv2.10:17.3: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na mohaṭṭhāniyo na aññāṇakaraṇo na acakkhukaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṃvattaniko, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:18.3: Ye keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ suṇanti, sabbe te maggaṃ bhāventīti?
kv2.10:19.1: Ye keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ suṇanti, sabbe te maggaṃ bhāventīti?
kv2.10:19.3: Bālaputhujjanā buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ suṇanti, bālaputhujjanā maggaṃ bhāventīti?
kv2.10:19.11: saṃghabhedako buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ suṇāti, saṃghabhedako maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv2.10:20.1: ☒ Labbhā sovaṇṇamayāya laṭṭhiyā dhaññapuñjopi suvaṇṇapuñjopi ācikkhitunti?
kv2.10:20.3: Evamevaṃ bhagavā lokuttarena vohārena lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṃ voharatīti.
kv2.10:21.1: Labbhā elaṇḍiyāya laṭṭhiyā dhaññapuñjopi suvaṇṇapuñjopi ācikkhitunti?
kv2.10:21.3: Evamevaṃ bhagavā lokiyena vohārena lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṃ voharatīti.
kv2.10:22.1: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttaro hotīti?
kv2.10:22.3: Lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiye sote paṭihaññati, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttare sote paṭihaññati;
kv2.10:22.4: lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttarena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti;
kv2.10:22.5: lokiyaṃ voharantassa puthujjanā paṭivijānanti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa sāvakā paṭivijānantīti?
kv2.10:23.2: “buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttaro hotī”ti?
kv2.10:23.4: Nanu bhagavā lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṃ voharatīti?
kv2.10:23.6: Hañci bhagavā lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṃ voharati, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.10:23.7: “buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttaro hotī”ti.
kv2.10:24.1: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttaro hotīti?
kv2.10:24.3: Maggaṃ voharantassa maggo hoti, amaggaṃ voharantassa amaggo hoti, phalaṃ voharantassa phalaṃ hoti, aphalaṃ voharantassa aphalaṃ hoti, nibbānaṃ voharantassa nibbānaṃ hoti, anibbānaṃ voharantassa anibbānaṃ hoti, saṅkhataṃ voharantassa saṅkhataṃ hoti, asaṅkhataṃ voharantassa asaṅkhataṃ hoti, rūpaṃ voharantassa rūpaṃ hoti, arūpaṃ voharantassa arūpaṃ hoti, vedanaṃ voharantassa vedanā hoti, avedanaṃ voharantassa avedanā hoti, saññaṃ voharantassa saññā hoti, asaññaṃ voharantassa asaññā hoti, saṅkhāre voharantassa saṅkhārā honti, asaṅkhāre voharantassa asaṅkhārā honti, viññāṇaṃ voharantassa viññāṇaṃ hoti, aviññāṇaṃ voharantassa aviññāṇaṃ hotīti?
